isis.stitle: CAB: DAYCAB AND SLEEPER CAB for ProStar, ProStar Premium, and ProStar Limited Models - INSTALL - CAB DOOR WINDOW SLIDE BLOCK

svcsubproc.title: Install Cab Door Window Slide Block for Cab Door with Electric Door Window and Locks on Daycab and Sleeper Cab

note.para: It is not necessary to replace the plastic retaining tab broken off to remove the front cab door window slide block from the front cab door window slide rail.

svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 40
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Check cab door window slide block (Item 3) for ware or damage, if worn or damaged, replace it. Working through the cab door access opening (Item 5, Figure 39) , slide the cab door window slide block (Item 3) into the cab door window slide rail (Item 4), driver side shown.

svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 39
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Working through the cab door access opening (Item 5), carefully push window regulator arm (Item 7) into the cab door window slide block (Item 9) in the cab door window slide rail (Item 10), driver side shown.

Install cab door vapor barrier, refer to
CAB DOOR VAPOR BARRIER
. For installing cab door vapor barrier, refer to Install Cab Door Vapor Barrier with Electric Door Window and Locks on Daycab and Sleeper Cab
.

Install cab door trim panel, refer to
CAB DOOR TRIM PANEL
. If cab door is equipped with electric door window and locks, refer to Install Cab Door Trim Panel with Electric Door Window and Locks on Daycab and Sleeper Cab
Repeat procedure to install passenger side cab door window slide block.

svcsubproc.title: Install Cab Door Window Slide Block for Cab Door with Manual Door Window and Locks on Daycab and Sleeper Cab

note.para: It is not necessary to replace the plastic retaining tab broken off to remove the front cab door window slide block from the front cab door window slide rail.

svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 40
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Check cab door window slide block (Item 3) for ware or damage, if worn or damaged, replace it. Working through the cab door access opening (Item 5, Figure 439) , slide the cab door window slide block (Item 3) into the cab door window slide rail (Item 4), driver side shown.

svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 41
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Working through the cab door access opening (Item 5), carefully push window regulator arm (Item 7) into the cab door window slide block (Item 9) in the cab door window slide rail (Item 10), driver side shown.

Install cab door vapor barrier, refer to
CAB DOOR VAPOR BARRIER
. For installing cab door vapor barrier, refer to Install Cab Door Vapor Barrier with Electric Door Window and Locks on Daycab and Sleeper Cab
.

Install cab door trim panel, refer to
CAB DOOR TRIM PANEL
. If cab door is equipped with electric door window and locks, refer to Install Cab Door Trim Panel with Electric Door Window and Locks on Daycab and Sleeper Cab
Repeat procedure to install passenger side cab door window slide block.
